history.content:
WHAT: Connect with industry professionals for career advice, interview prep, and networking. We'll match you to our mentors from Google, Cisco, and Amazon who work in a range of roles in tech: engineering, product management, data science, business operations, designers, marketing, directors, and executives.

WHO: Any Berkeley student of any major and year interested in working in tech.

WHEN: At least one initial 30 minute session scheduled between you and your mentor, with follow ups discussed between mentor and mentee.

WHERE: Online video conference

MENTEE SIGNUP: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfMcYQVnCLbxkpG0IMu-TVf1yT-kokzkq0iPT5tbwlX1IdkwA/viewform

2/6: Signup form closes.

Questions or feedback? Email alanlp@berkeley.edu
history.subject: [1m signup] FREE 1:1 mentorship, job prep from professionals @ Google, Cisco, etc. 100+ mentee slots

history.content:
WHAT: Connect with industry professionals for career advice, interview prep, and networking. We'll match you to our mentors from Google, Cisco, and Amazon who work in a range of roles in tech: engineering, product management, data science, business operations, designers, marketing, directors, and executives.

WHO: Any Berkeley student of any major and year interested in working in tech.

WHEN: At least one initial 30 minute session scheduled between you and your mentor, with follow ups discussed between mentor and mentee.

WHERE: Online video conference

>> MENTEE SIGNUP: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfMcYQVnCLbxkpG0IMu-TVf1yT-kokzkq0iPT5tbwlX1IdkwA/viewform <<

TIMELINE:

2/6: Signup form closes.

2/15: We'll get back to you if we have space. If we do, we'll send an email with you and your mentor cc'd, including tips for a successful meeting. You'll confirm a initial time and date to meet online, and a discussion topic with your mentor.

Interested in mentoring? https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfdYo6-MB6vKEZ6o5JUe8SnGaVTwQWVwCrQzI-vaSZ49UVn-A/viewform

Questions or feedback? Email alanlp@berkeley.edu
history.subject: [1m signup] FREE 1:1 mentorship, job prep from professionals @ Google, Cisco, etc. 100+ mentee slots
